Articles.Content:
hi all,

finally I took the decision to register to this forum, after years of playing and reading.... 

I'll start my challenges ASAP!

Truer words were never spoken... aside from Castlevania.

Anyway welcome to the dark s- I mean the forums. As usual, we have some cookies over there, there're some beverages in the fridge, and we now have complimentary hugs! It's gonna be a good time.

Yes, yes it really is one of the best games ever made.

So simple: Take some "LEGO" parts and use them to build rockets ...

So deep: ... so you can explore a physics accurate representation of a tiny solar system.

> 
> hi all,
> finally I took the decision to register to this forum, after years of playing and reading.... 
> 
> I'll start my challenges ASAP!

Welcome superstarlord. I too agree with you - I only recently found out about this fascinating game and already the hook is set and I'm being reeled in. Trying not to kill too many Kerbals while on the steep learning curve. Because of my inexperience and fear of failure (!) I'm yet to start a serious career mode. Shouldn't be long now though!

Welcome aboard!

The only challenges you need to do are the ones you want. But \*shameless plug\* [For The Stealthiest...](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121473-For-The-Stealthiest) is a good one! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Anything you want to know about KSP (or almost anything) you can find one the forums. Have fun!
